document.full_text: rafael soriano, tuesday's goat, pitched a scoreless eighth inning and mariano rivera worked the ninth to secure a.j. burnett's second win of the early season.
document.title: yankees 4, twins 3: twins' misery against yankees is compounded by injury
lines_and_colors: rafael soriano, tuesday's goat, pitched a scoreless eighth inning and mariano rivera worked the ninth to secure a.j. burnett's second win of the early season.
